OrgName.entry: FRANCE, THE REPUBLIC OF - CONSUL FOR

Desc.entry: The Consul for The Republic of France provides services for French citizens and others requiring French documentation, translation, signatures etc and advice on French legislation. Home visits can be arranged if necessary for people with disabilities. Consul covers Sheffield, Cambridgshire, Derbyshire, Humberside, Leicestershire, Lincolnshire, Nottinghamshire, Shropshire, Staffordshire and Warwickshire.

ContactName.entry: Ms C M Vincentelli-Adlington, Consul Honoraire de France
